articles.author: Gilberto Manzano
articles.title: NFL Fact or Fiction: Colts Should Trade QB Anthony Richardson After Benching - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: The 2023 first-round pick needs more time to develop. Can Indianapolis provide him with that? Plus, will the 49ers win the NFC West?
articles.content:
Another quarterback drafted inside the top five of the 2023 NFL draft was benched Tuesday. 
The Indianapolis Colts turned to veteran Joe Flacco after benching
 Anthony Richardson, the No. 4 pick in… [+7330 chars]
